#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
#define FOR(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<=b;i++)
#define gc() getchar_unlocked()
int fastio()
{
    int x=0;
    char c=gc();
    while(c<'0'||c>'9')
        c=gc();
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
    {
        x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-'0';
        c=gc();
    }
    return(x);
}
int main()
{
    int t,i,n,c,num,mx,index;
    t=fastio();
    while(t--)
    {
        c=1;
        mx=0;
        n=fastio();
        FOR(i,1,n)
        {
            num=fastio();
            if(num>=mx)
            {
                mx=num;
                index=c;
            }
            c++;
        }
        printf("%d\n",index);
    }
    return 0;
}
